head.title: Paid Notice: Memorials KIRKLAND, THE REV. DR. BRYANT M.

identified-content.person: KIRKLAND, THE REV. DR. BRYANT M.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Memorials KIRKLAND, THE REV. DR. BRYANT M.

block.p: KIRKLAND-The Rev. Dr. Bryant M., senior minister emeritus of The Fifth Avenue Presbyterian Church, died on Easter Sunday, April 23. A memorial service will be held on Friday, May 5, at 2:30 PM, in the sanctuary of The Fifth Avenue Presbyterian Church, Fifth Avenue at 55th Street, in Manhattan.

KIRKLAND-The Rev. Dr. Bryant M., senior minister emeritus of The Fifth Avenue Presbyterian Church, died on Easter Sunday, April 23. A memorial service will be held on Friday, May 5, at 2:30 PM, in the sanctuary of The Fifth Avenue Presbyterian Church, Fifth Avenue at 55th Street, in Manhattan.
